article.title: U.S. Army Depot Procures Tablets, Think Pads and Computers
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Iron Bow Technology, Chantilly, Virginia, was awarded a more than $13 million firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of 5,096 Lenovo tablets; 217 Lenovo think pads; 520 Lenovo think centre; 261 Fujitsu computers; and 40 Wyse computers.Â The Tobyhanna Army Depot, Tobyhanna, Pennsylvania, is the contracting activity. The depot also awarded an approximate $7 million firm-fixed price contract to Dell Federal Systems, L.P., Round Rock, Texas, for 354 Latitude E6520 computers and 6,295 Dell OptiPlex small form factor computers.
